entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
